## What is code?
- A set of instructions
- Usually in scripts
- Written using a programming language

## What is no-code?
- A graphical user interface
- Point and click
- Drag and drop

## What is low-code?
- A combination of code and no-code
- Most no-code tools allow code (Excel)
- No-code and low-code can be interchangeable
